hazards.description: Worker at height without fall protection system
recommendations: Install proper fall protection system immediately
Ensure worker is wearing proper fall arrest harness
Provide safety training on fall protection
hazards.immediateAction: STOP WORK - Install fall protection before continuing

hazards.description: Hard hat not worn by worker
recommendations: Require hard hat use in all construction areas
Conduct PPE inspection before work begins
hazards.immediateAction: Worker must don hard hat before continuing work

hazards.description: Exposed electrical wiring in work area

recommendations: Immediately implement fall protection measures for workers at height
Ensure all workers wear required hard hats
Address exposed electrical wiring before continuing work
Conduct comprehensive safety training for all personnel

oshaViolations.title: Fall Protection - Unprotected Sides and Edges
oshaViolations.description: Each employee on a walking/working surface with an unprotected side or edge which is 6 feet or more above a lower level shall be protected from falling
oshaViolations.correctiveAction: Install guardrail systems, safety net systems, or personal fall arrest systems

oshaViolations.title: Personal Protective Equipment - Head Protection
oshaViolations.description: Employees working in areas where there is a possible danger of head injury from impact shall be protected by protective helmets
oshaViolations.correctiveAction: Provide and require use of ANSI-approved hard hats
